Code preview of the reference CountryCurrency

USE DATABASECOUNTRYHL
go

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1
FROM SYS.SYSREFERENCES R JOIN SYS.SYSOBJECTS O ON (O.ID = R.CONSTID AND O.TYPE = 'F')
WHERE R.FKEYID = OBJECT_ID('COUNTRY_CURRENCY') AND O.NAME = 'FK_COUNTRY__COUNTRYCU_COUNTRY')
ALTER TABLE COUNTRY_CURRENCY
DROP CONSTRAINT FK_COUNTRY__COUNTRYCU_COUNTRY
go

ALTER TABLE COUNTRY_CURRENCY
ADD CONSTRAINT FK_COUNTRY__COUNTRYCU_COUNTRY FOREIGN KEY (COU_ID)
REFERENCES COUNTRY (COU_ID)
go
